title.rendered: Bangladesh vs Ireland, 3rd T20I 2023: Fantasy Team, Probable Playing XIs, Pitch Report & Fantasy Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team on basis of probable XIs, recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Shakib Al Hasan promoted himself to number three in the last match

Bangladesh: Litton Das (wk), Rony Talukdar, Najmul Hossain Shanto, Shakib Al Hasan (c), Towhid Hridoy, Shamim Hossain, Mehidy Hasan Miraz, Nasum Ahmed, Taskin Ahmed, Mustafizur Rahman, Hasan Mahmud

Ireland: Paul Stirling (c), Ross Adair, Lorcan Tucker (wk), Harry Tector, Gareth Delany, George Dockrell, Curtis Campher, Mark Adair, Fionn Hand/Craig Young, Graham Hume, Benjamin White

Pitch Report

Venue: Zahur Ahmed Chowdhury Stadium, Chattogram

(Based on last three games)

1st innings average score: 202

2nd innings average score: 175

Wickets per innings: 5

Type: Good for batting

Wins

Batting 1st: 67%

Batting 2nd: 33%

Also Read:

Gujarat vs Chennai, Indian T20 League 2023: Fantasy Tips

Hyderabad vs Rajasthan, Indian T20 League 2023 Fantasy Tips

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Shakib Al Hasan has encouraging all-round numbers at the venue: 281 runs at 70 and 14 wickets including the best figures of five for 22.

Litton Das is going through a purple patch: he has registered three half-centuries and three thirties in the last nine T20s, accumulating 371 runs at 41. He has also pouched nine catches in this period.

Rony Talukdar, along with Litton, has been giving solid starts to Bangladesh. Batting first in 2023, Talukdar has scored 135 runs at 45 in three matches, producing bonus points for 18 boundaries.

Taskin Ahmed has rediscovered himself as a fast bowler. In five T20Is in 2023, he has scalped 11 wickets at a strike rate of 9.8.

Curtis Campher is an effective fantasy pick when he plays in Asia, where he has scored 183 runs at 26 and scalped 11 wickets in as many matches.

As a captain, Paul Stirling has scored 269 runs in eight matches. He has also pouched four catches and scalped a wicket in this period.

Harry Tector (119 runs, six wickets, and three catches) has featured in the Best11 in the last five T20Is.

Mark Adair has not gone wicketless in the last nine T20Is, bagging 13 wickets at a strike rate of 12.6.

George Dockrell has managed only 149 runs and one wicket in his last 11 T20Is.

Fionn Hand has picked just three wickets in nine T20Is, going wicketless in six of them.

Mehidy Hasan Miraz has failed to get a wicket in 10 of the 13 T20 innings this year.

Openers scored three fifties and three thirties in the last three matches at the venue, while pacers scalped 62% of the wickets.
